faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our platform and courses.

questions.question: Do I need any prior knowledge to start?
questions.answer: No prior knowledge is required. Our courses are designed for beginners and advanced learners alike.

questions.question: Are the courses free?
questions.answer: We offer both free and paid courses. Many of our foundational courses are completely free.

questions.question: Can I learn at my own pace Aman?
questions.answer: Yes! All our courses are self-paced, allowing you to learn at your own speed.
